data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Borowiec, Lech, Wietojañska, Jolanta (2014): A revision of the genus Herminella Spaeth (Chrysomelidae: Cassidinae: Notosacanthini), with a description of a new related genus and species from Madagascar. Zootaxa 3895 (2): 257-272, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3895.2.7
